name: CUBICLE NINJA
description:
Unlike some people, you actually have a job.  Wake up, shower, force feed, commute, grind, commute, wind down, brush teeth, sleep. Repeat until put out to pasture.

A character class for CY_BORG.

This is an independent production by Diogo Barros and is not affiliated with Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the CY_BORG Third Party License.
